53.50 % , 65.00 % and 50 %.on: Restaurant , Laptop and Twitter testing datasets

Majority method.from sentence: We can find that the Majority method is the worst , which means the majority sentiment polarity occupies 53.50 % , 65.00 % and 50 % of all samples on the Restaurant , Laptop and Twitter testing datasets respectively .

Simple SVM model.from sentence: The Simple SVM model performs better than Majority .

Our model.from sentence: Our model achieves significantly better results than feature - enhanced SVM .

basic LSTM approach.from sentence: Among LSTM based neural networks described in this paper , the basic LSTM approach performs the worst .

TD - LSTM.from sentence: TD - LSTM obtains an improvement of 1 - 2 % over LSTM when target signals are taken into consideration .

MemNet.from sentence: MemNet achieves better results than other models on the Restaurant dataset , since it considers not only the contexts of targets but also the position of each context word related to the target .

IAN.from sentence: IAN considers separate representations of targets and obtains better result on the Laptop dataset .

GRNN - G3.from sentence: GRNN - G3 achieves competitive results on all datasets because of its three - way structure and special gated - RNN model .

LCR - Rot model.from sentence: In the contrast , our LCR - Rot model achieves the best results on the all datasets among all models .

With the help of.from sentence: With the help of feature engineering , the Feature - enhanced SVM achieves much better results .
